author: {'steamid': '76561198172925593', 'num_games_owned': 14023, 'num_reviews': 4533, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1559714507}
review:
一款解谜游戏
基本规则上其实就是个类一笔画游戏
但玩起来非常不舒服，每一步移动都有非常明显的卡顿感
没有撤销功能，有时候不小心点多了一步就只能整关重来
如果移动到了重复的路线上面直接卡几秒后就给你重来
总之整个游戏看起来就是一个非常一般的一刀游戏的质量。这个价格不值

author: {'steamid': '76561198008729441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1467984600}
review:
Puzzle Nebula is a nice little puzzle game, that you can easily enjoy in small bursts.

The difficulty curve of the levels starts out with being almost laughably easy, but as you approach the mid-30s it'll have introduced plenty of elements that'll require you to actually think about where you move your little piece of space junk.

For those with collector's mentalities out there, the game also has some datalogs that you find on some of the stages, all of which ultimately combine to a fun little story. Nothing mind-blowing, but certainly not terrible either.

All in all, if you're looking for something that you don't have sit with for more than 10 or 15 minutes at a time, Puzzle Nebula is worth a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041962772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1467788269}
review:
This game might be hard enough to tick you off, but the story is intriguing enough to keep you around for a bit.  As you progress, new elements are brought in which add more depth and create a greater challenge.  The game's cheap enough to at least give it a shot, honestly, and you should.  Here's my full-length [url=http://morestufflike.com/reviews/puzzle-nebula-game-review/] review [/url].

Pros:
Challenging puzzles
Satisfying puzzles
Puzzling puzzles
Puzzles

Cons:
Story should be more front-and-center, not tucked away in 'Datalogs'
Could look a little better, but ain't bad

author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1467798065}
review:
Интересная 3D головоломка с оригинальной идеей. Все дело происхолит в космосе, вы - цилиндрик)) просыпаетесь в космосе в какой то странной машине и вам нужно от туда выбраться.

+ интересные головоломки
+ случайно генерируемый фон, не приедается
+ поддержка контроллера, хоть и частичная
+ много уровней

- нет достижений
- нет коллекционных карт
